CustomField.description: Used to run the conga DC command. The DC parameter accepts a 1 or a 0, so we need to translate the boolean.
CustomField.formula: IF( Case__r.IsClosed = true || CONTAINS( Parent_Contractor_Account_Verified__c, 'Not Verified'), 1, 0)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Payment requests can't be sent if the case is closed or the related addresses and company names haven't been verified.
CustomField.label: Conga: Payment Request Not Possible
